name: Video Ocean v2.0
tagline: Turn your ideas and images into captivating videos instantly
description: Video Ocean transforms your text and images into stunning videos with lifelike characters—perfect for ads, creative storytelling, and media production. Boost your video creation workflow effortlessly.

name: iglu
tagline: Micro-journaling with on-device intelligence, for iOS
description: Write short entries, make threads with them, search them by meaning, and revisit them through intelligent recommendations related to your recent writing — all that with on-device, non-generative AI. iglu is the most private journaling app out there.

name: Online NotesPad
tagline: Free online notes taking app
description: Online NotesPad is a free, privacy-focused note-taking application that lets you create, edit, and manage your notes with ease. All notes are stored locally for complete privacy.

name: Terminal of Woe
tagline: Enjoy each minute equally
description: Inspired by the mysterious terminals in Severance, Terminal of Woe invites you to observe a grid of numbers and trust your intuition. Built on iPad and iPhone using Codea, and fully open-source. You are permitted to modify the work. Do not question the task.

name: Outerspan
tagline: Deploy agents that have their own email inbox
description: Create and deploy AI agents with fully-managed email inboxes through a simple API or dashboard. Build support bots, lead qualifiers, or check-in agents that communicate via email—all without infrastructure headaches

name: Epic Dev Battles of History
tagline: Challenge top dev in an epic GitHub contribution showdown!
description: Take on famous developers in an exciting battle of GitHub contributions! Play a retro arcade-style game with multiplayer mode and compete against coding legends from around the world.

name: Exvero
tagline: Convert money, crypto & metals
description: Instantly convert currencies, cryptocurrencies, and precious metals. Beautiful design, real-time rates, and no ads – made for travelers and traders. Exvero makes everyday conversions fast, accurate, and effortless.

name: vennbrd
tagline: add gifs to your chats as you type
description: you’re batman and this is alfred (but only for pictures, lol). suggests you emojis + gifs as you type, based how you’re feeling. it’s beautiful, functional and just there when you need it.

name: Your first step
tagline: Launch a profitable SaaS with confidence
description: Ready to kickstart your entrepreneurial dream? Your first step contains everything you need to build a SaaS users actually want, in days. → Solopreneur Guide → Express/Angular Boilerplate → Astro Boilerplate

name: Elissa - My Panic Ally
tagline: Your Panic & Anxiety Ally—AI Powered, DSM-5 Based
description: No more reservations, high fees, and therapist judgment. Meet Elissa—your private AI ally for anxiety and panic. Gain deep insights into your anxiety patterns with Cognitive Behavioral Therapy-based logging. Instant, one-tap Panic SOS is the cherry on top.

name: Vimageo
tagline: Advanced Image & Video Annotation
description: Vimageo is the ultimate annotation tool for seamless image & video markup. Whether reviewing images, analyzing frames, or giving feedback, it’s powerful yet easy to use. Elevate digital collaboration with an intuitive, shareable platform for visual content

name: Dopamine Menu Builder
tagline: Design a menu of activities to replace mindless scrolling
description: We’ve made it easy to create your own dopamine menu. Fill in the activities for each category, then save your menu to your Photos app or print it out.

name: Shots by CD
tagline: Turn images into engaging gifs for social media
description: Turn your static images and screenshots into eye-catching animated GIFs with beautiful backgrounds and effects. No design skills required.

name: Domain360
tagline: Find the Best Domains – All in One Place
description: Find the best domain auctions and closeouts from multiple marketplaces, in one place. As of now we support godaddy, dynadot, namecheap, dropcatch, park.io, Sedona and sav.

name: Web Design Inspiration
tagline: Some website designs I liked and felt the need to hoard.
description: Web design inspiration: a curated collection of websites and website sections.

name: DocBlitz®
tagline: Automated documentation for software projects
description: Creating & maintaining documentation is a serious pain for software developers. DocBlitz AI-generates beautiful documentation that stays in sync with your codebase, meaning it never goes out of date. You can even chat with your docs!

name: A Template
tagline: All Success Begins With A Template
description: All the free web templates you need for product, business, landing pages, blogs, portfolios, ecommerce, and admin dashboards.

name: Coolz
tagline: Watch Faces for Apple Watch
description: Coolz App is designed to help users personalize their Apple Watches by providing a diverse collection of high-quality Watch Faces designed by top-notch designers worldwide.

name: Universal Palette Converter 2.0
tagline: Manage and convert color palettes across various formats.
description: Universal Palette Converter is the ultimate solution for converting color palettes across various formats. Designed for designers, artists, and anyone in need of precise color management, this app streamlines the process of importing and exporting color data.

name: Focshot
tagline: Highlight what matters in your screenshots
description: Focshot is a simple tool to add highlight effect and annotation to your screenshots.

tagline: Turn your ideas and images into captivating videos instantly
